mapper.select: SELECT le.classNum, className, price, firstPhoto, le.addr1, nickName, TO_CHAR(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, TO_CHAR(endDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate FROM wishList Wl JOIN lesson le ON wl.classNum = le.classNum JOIN member m ON m.memberIdx = le.memberIdx JOIN member1 ml ON m.memberIdx = ml.memberIdx JOIN plus pl ON ml.userId = pl.userId WHERE wl.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY wl.wishDate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM wishList Wl JOIN lesson le ON wl.classNum = le.classNum JOIN member m ON m.memberIdx = le.memberIdx JOIN member1 ml ON m.memberIdx = ml.memberIdx JOIN plus pl ON ml.userId = pl.userId WHERE wl.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishList(wishDate, userId, classNum) VALUES (SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{classNum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishList WHERE classNum = #{classNum} AND userId = #{userId}
